body:
Features and Enhancements

Competitive Dashboard
  • All Count Types (Dental Dashboard)
    • Ability to view all count types (Provider, Provider Location, Office) at one time.
    • Ability to export a report with all count types (Provider, Provider Location, Office) at one time.
  • Geographic Filtering
    • Filter networks visible in network dropdown based on selected geographic criteria.

Create a List

  • Confirmed Practicing
    • Ability to filter by Confirmed Practicing for appropriately configured projects

Competitive Access

  • Automatic base network configuration for all networks in project
    • Base network configuration is no longer required. Once the network is added in Legacy Ops, it will flow through to the project automatically.
    • Note: Client Id and Specialty Mapping configurations to enable Competitive Access must still be done before the networks will be available as Base Network in Network Selection.

Issues Fixed

Compare Networks - Confirmed Practicing
  • Fixed an issue where Network Strength by Geography count did not match Detail Results
